item.description:
Many of us want to go dancing together. Enough talking and wishing, time for action.
Come join Suzy Spivey, Shannon Brophy and Chew-Hoong at “Dance Friday” this SATURDAY night. We look forward to dancing and laughing the night away with lots of you!

Agenda (organized by The Dance Friday Community):
7:30-8:30 Salsa Rueda - Danny Trenner
8:30-1:00am DJ'd Dance - Astrid Lewis, Chad Lewis, and David Sheppard; Mareba Jos will be our hostess.

Your investment of "pure fun":
sliding scale adults $12-$16, teens $6-12.
The parents cooperative will have a sitter at each evenings dance. Each family is to pay $5 directly to the sitter for each evening dance you attend.

To connect with each other:
Go to back room (with pillows) of dance area.
Look for a sign: "BostonLOA".
Grab and tag yourself with a label "BostonLOA" .
Join us on the dance floor.


**************************
The Dance Friday Community is organizing a special event this weekend:
Dance New England Weekend May 1-3, 2009
Go here for more details:
http://dancefriday.or...

Note of Interest:
Sat, May 2, Suzy Spivey, our very talented Boston LOA member, is conducting a dance workshop from 2:30-4: Journey Dance

About Dance Friday:
Dance Friday is a place to dance barefoot*, however you like, with or without a partner, to all kinds of music, in a smoke-and alcohol-free space. We are a volunteer-run, consensus-governed, non-profit dance organization.
All ages are welcome; children must be accomplished by a supervising adult.

*Wear socks or slippers if prefer not to be barefooted.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Dance the Night Away
